problem_text:
Let p be a prime number. Describe the groups of order p^9 of nilpotency class 2 which contain subgroups X and Y such that |X| = |Y| = p^3 and any non-identity elements x ∈ X, y ∈ Y do not commute. An answer to this question would yield a description of the semifields of order p^3.
S. N. Adamov, A. N. Fomin
answer: They are described (V. A. Antonov, Preprint, Chelyabinsk, 1999 (Russian)).
